attributes.action: Let people go back fishing whilst the lockdown is in place
attributes.additional_details:
allow fishing to carry on private lakes or small commercial fishery’s where social distance practising can be carried out with ease

Most lakes swims are much further apart than two meters and no need to come into contact with anyone

This will also help protect fish stocks worth 10s of thousands as poaching and trespassing has already started

fishing is in know way affecting the spread of covid-19
attributes.background:
I would like the government to relax there decision on making fishing unavailable in the current crisis

On most lakes, you are more isolated than anywhere else
